scripts.build: npm run build-browserify && npm run build-uglify
scripts.build-browserify: browserify --transform brfs -g [ babelify --presets [ latest ] ] scripts/browser/index.js > public/index.js
scripts.build-debug: browserify --debug --transform brfs -g [ babelify --presets [ latest ] ] scripts/browser/index.js > public/index.js
